channel.title: Wtf is with battlescape source...?
channel.description:
err well everyone was making a big fuss about battlescape source dl so i dled it(never actually played) and i try to run it to test and kaboom... i look in client.java there is "for" methods with 4 different parts..... is there something in jdk 1.6 that 1.7 doesnt have...?
edit: oh wait sql is offbut putting it on wouldnt make a diff as far as im concerned
edit2: nvm lol its decompiled of course its fucked.

adog, I know battlescape is back up… there is NO point though seeing as T X is an admin now, T X loves to fuck with people. And I NEVER got my premium back… dont tell me I know nothing because I do, also mironic your calling me a “noob” because I wouldnt host your server because it gave me virus’ yeah… thats being a real noob.

item.title: Wtf is with battlescape source...?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

Ibehustlin247:

Battlescape was the closest server to runescape I EVER played, although it was taken down sadly by a hacker time and time again so eventually they gave up and shut down… honestly had the best private server economy, almost exact rs pking, quests, all the good stuff…

lol!!!
Pali is working on the 503 and may host the 317 server while we wait, you know nothing, also t x gave the database back, that means prems and stuff back,

and yeh if you decompile battlescape your gonna get lots of errors.

Read full topic
